articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Fishery Station under KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Fishery Station under KPA Unit
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the August 25 Fishery Station under KPA Unit 313.
					He shook hands of commanding officers of the unit and officials of the fishery station present to greet him one by one and got aboard a fishing boat.
					
					He said that the fishery station should catch a lot of fishes with good fishing boats and supply the soldiers on the forefront with them all the year round so that the fishing boats provided by the Party may pay off profusely. He went down to an engine room and learned in detail about its arrangement, its consumption of fuel and H.P.
					
					Going round the front and middle cabins, he underscored the need to arrange them well so that its crew may not feel any inconvenience in their living. He told the commanding officers and officials an experience gained by a fishery base in effectively using spent fuel, underscoring the need to make sure that fishermen can have rest in a warm place as their hands are wet in cold water of rough sea.
					
					He said that each fishing boat should haul 1 000 tons of fishes every year, telling them to write a letter to the Supreme Commander when they honor their plan.
					
					A drive for cultivating soybean is now under way in the People's Army, he noted, calling for successfully conducting both soybean growing and fishing operations to provide the soldiers with soybean and fishes all the year round.
					
					When he was requested to name the fishing boat by KPA officers and officials of the fishery station, he proposed naming it "maple" symbolic of autumn.
					
					He went round the monument to the field guidance provided by leader Kim Jong Il to the fishery station, giving it important instructions on August 25, 1973, and the room dedicated to the history of the fishery station.
					
					He made the rounds of the storehouse of fishing tackle and the refrigerating chamber of the station.
					
					He called on the fishery station to undertake aquaculture on a large scale while catching a lot of fishes in order to boost aquatic products, adding that it is necessary to cultivate seaweed, tangle, mussel, etc. in a big way.
					
					He said he visited the supply base on the east coast under KPA Unit 639 a few days ago where he saw it providing good supply service and catching a lot of fishes by putting fishing operations on a scientific basis, urging them to follow the working style and experience of the officials at that unit.
					
					He had a photo session with the officials and employees of the fishery station.
					
					He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Jon Chang Bok, Yun Tong Hyon, Jo Kyong Chol, An Ji Yong, Kim Su Gil and Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Persons of Merit
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Candidate Academician, Prof. and Dr. Rim Thae Gun, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University; Kim Chun Nam, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and People's Artiste at the National Theatrical Troupe; and Labor Hero Mun Su Ok, manager of the Kaechon Department Store; on their 70th birthdays. 
					Rim Thae Gun was born in a family of a day laborer before the liberation of the country. After the liberation he studied hard, benefited from the educational system provided by President Kim Il Sung. He has devoted himself to the education of students and scientific researches for over 40 years.
					
					He explored a series of study subjects, authored a lot of textbooks, reference books and scientific essays. He helped not a few persons hold academic degrees. 
					
					Kim Chun Nam grew up to be a famous actor and played a leading part in the revolutionary drama "Mountain Shrine" under the care of the peerlessly great persons. For several decades since then he starred in several films and dramas including multi-part feature films "The Nation and Destiny" and "Red Maple Leaves."
					
					He successfully played the part of the chairman of the managerial board of a farm in the light comedy "An Echo among the Hills," contributing to arousing the servicepersons and other people of the DPRK to actively turn out in the drive for effecting a great surge and making the whole country swept by the spirit of the drama.
					
					Mun Su Ok has worked heart and soul as a servant of people since her girlhood. 
					
					She grew up to be a woman official known to the whole country  though her fate had been no better than a cobblestone in a street, bereft of her parents in the past.

articles.title: Greetings to Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ethiopian President
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday sent a message of greeting to Girma Wolde-Giorgis, president of Ethiopia, on the occasion of its national day.
					Kim in his message sincerely wished the Ethiopian president and people bigger successes in their efforts for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Musan Mining Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Musan Mining Complex
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Musan Mining Complex, the nation's leading iron ore producer. 
					The premier went round different places of the complex including the 2nd ore-dressing shop, the open-cast sub-mine, the conveyer station for earth removal and the ore conveyance station to learn in detail about production and technological updating there.
					
					A consultative meeting of officials concerned took place there.
					
					The meeting discussed measures for increasing iron ore production by making an effective use of the existing production foundation on the principle of giving priority to the earth removal.
					
					It also took measures for raising the operating rate of vehicles which play a big role in earth removal. It called on the relevant units to produce and provide necessary spare parts in good time. 
					
					Meanwhile, he went round the Musan Foodstuff Factory and Musan Wood Processing Factory where he called for increasing the competitiveness of products.

articles.title: Paekmasan Walls, Heritage of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Paekmasan Walls, Heritage of Korean Nation
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- In Phihyon County, North Phyongan Province of Korea, there are Paekmasan Walls, built in the period of Koguryo Kingdom (277 BC-668 AD).
					The walls were reinforced in the periods of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392) and the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					Mt. Paekma, in which the walls were built, is located in the area leading to Liaodong area of China across Amnok River in the north and to Pyongyang via Kusong, Pakchon and Anju in the south.
					
					The walls are composed of inner and outer ones.
					
					The 2 590 meter-long inner walls were reinforced in 1014-1017 with Uma Walls built in the period of Koguryo Kingdom as bedding, while the 2 430 meter-long outer walls were built in 1753.
					
					The five to seven meter-high outer walls had arch-shaped gates in the east, west, south and north, with two-storied building in the south gate, which was destroyed by the Japanese aggressors.
					
					Inside the walls there are 13 sites of ponds and 32 sites of wells, as well as the sites of armory, food storehouse and barracks.
					
					The walls are one of symbols indicative of the Korean people's struggle against aggression.

articles.title: New Kind of Toothpaste, One of Attractions at Int'l Trade Fair
articles.content:
New Kind of Toothpaste, One of Attractions at Int'l Trade Fair
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean Sangwon Trading Company presented a new kind of toothpaste at the 16th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair held some days ago.
					In this regard, KCNA met Kim Yon Hui, an official of the company.
					
					She said:
					
					The chestnut-color toothpaste is made of various species of medical plants indigenous to Korea, including liquorice and dandelion.
					
					Effective for five years, it is efficacious for killing dental bacteria. It washes away toothscum and removes tartar in 15 to 20 days from the beginning of use.
					
					It is believed to be good especially for children.
					
					The toothpaste was granted with the DPRK patent right.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The departed soul of "yusin" dictatorship is being brought back in practice in south Korea.
					Last year the "Saenuri Party" called back the departed soul of "yusin" dictatorship through political interference in the "presidential election." It is now desperately working to enact an evil law for establishing a dictatorial rule.
					
					It is working hard to stamp out the pro-reunification progressive forces standing for independence and democracy of south Korean society against the dictatorial policy, not content with suppressing them by labeling them as "forces following the north."
					
					This suffices to prove that the purpose of the "law on dissolving criminal organizations" which the group tries hard to adopt and its targets far surpass those of the draconian "Security Law."
					
					This indicates that the present south Korean authorities have revived the worst "yusin" dictatorial rule, putting into the shade traitor Lee Myung Bak's harsh dictatorship veiled with the word of "pragmatism."
					
					As already known in history, the Park Chung-Hee military junta seized power at the point of bayonet and enforced an extreme terror-ridden policy, turning the whole of south Korea into a tundra of democracy and human rights and a land of darkness. 
					
					He punished innocent people at random at the emergency court martial after frequently declaring "emergency martial law", "garrison decree order" and "state of emergency" and taking "emergency measures".
					
					As shown by a series of recent disclosures, many people fell victim to confrontation and conspiratorial cases orchestrated by the fascist junta as evidenced by the fact that they were arrested overnight on charges of "espionage" or "involvement in spy case."
					
					700 000 to 800 000 pro-reunification patriots and people of different social standings were put behind bars and killed in every year, a total of at least 14 million, during the 18-year long rule of Park Chung-Hee.
					
					The south Korean people are still stricken with horror, recollecting the "yusin" dictatorship as a nightmare.
					
					What matters is that the daughter of the military fascist dictator is zealously applying the fascist ruling method dating back to the period of the "yusin" regime after coming to power.
					
					Not content with patronizing the "yusin" dictatorship before her seizure of power, she blustered that but for "yusin", the south would have been swallowed up by the north and, with this in view, slight suppression of democracy was by no means worse than that case. These reckless remarks are enough to clearly show her stand and outlook on rule.
					
					She is busy making new evil laws at a time when the "emergency measures" taken during her father's dictatorship are declared illegal and truth behind the conspiratorial cases dating back to the period of the "yusin" regime is brought to light in succession. This is a blatant challenge to freedom, human rights and democracy.
					
					The people from all walks of life in south Korea should stage a dynamic struggle against the dictatorship and the "government." This is the only way for them to escape the fate of falling victim to the horrifying "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Smear Human Rights Campaign against DPRK Is Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Smear Human Rights Campaign against DPRK Is Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has recently exposed its sinister scheme to bring down the dignified social system in the DPRK through its fund-raising racket for backing institutions and organizations that take the lead in the smear human rights campaign against the DRPK. Timed to coincide with this, there took place in south Korea another conspiratorial farce of "human rights" against the DPRK under the disguise of an international conference. 
					Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					The despicable smear campaign of "human rights" by the U.S. and the puppet forces of south Korea betrays their weakness and poor plight. The campaign will end up in a shameful ruin of provocateurs.
					
					Their smear campaign is little different from an absurd provocation aimed to mislead the public opinion and realize their ambition to invade the DPRK.
					
					Fictitious are the "human rights" and "democracy" often touted by the U.S. They are, in fact, a slogan of aggression to serve the design for stifling those countries standing for independence against the U.S.
					
					It is the purpose sought by the U.S. and the puppet regime to break the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK and put into practice their ambition for "unification of social systems" through the smear campaign.
					
					However, it is nothing but a pipedream that can never come true.
					
					The smear campaign can never work on the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. and the puppet regime will get disgrace and international criticism for their smear campaign. 
					
					The DPRK will never pardon those scheming to invade it while daring hurt its dignified social system.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Distorting Kwangju Popular Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Distorting Kwangju Popular Uprising
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- 19 organizations of south Korea affiliated to the Solidarity of Self-governing Regional Movement for Democratic Society issued a joint statement denouncing the puppet group for distorting the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					The statement slammed the ultra-right conservative forces for falsifying the historic fact about the May 18 Kwangju movement for democracy without any reason.
					
					It blasted those forces for posting on their websites a series of articles insulting the victims of the May 18 Kwangju movement for democracy.
					
					To misrepresent the essence of the May 18 movement for democracy in which its participants fought to achieve democracy against the tyrannical rule was an act of infringing upon democracy, it held.
					
					It demanded an immediate end to such acts as imposing double and treble damage upon those killed by the "martial law army" and their families and many other people.

articles.title: Fascist Action against Pro-Reunification Patriot under Fire
articles.content:
Fascist Action against Pro-Reunification Patriot under Fire
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- On May 24 the puppet Seoul High Court sentenced Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), to four years in prison on charge of violation of the ill-famed "Security Law." This fascist action was taken against him for paying a visit to Pyongyang to pay condolences over the greatest loss to the Korean nation. 
					At the same time, it sentenced even the seriously ailing secretary general of the above-said headquarters to a prison term on a groundless charge that he helped Ro visit Pyongyang.
					
					A spokesman for the North Headquarters of Pomminryon said in a statement Monday in this regard:
					
					The puppet court's infliction of heavy penalties upon the members of the South Headquarters at a trial is part of the south Korean authorities' fascist scenario to stamp out the pro-reunification patriotic headquarters by labeling it an "organization benefiting the enemy" and a height of the confrontation racket against the DPRK.
					
					Ro's Pyongyang visit can never be a crime in the light of the elementary human ethics and morality and beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation handed down through generations as it was a great righteous deed prompted by his single desire for national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					The statement bitterly condemned the suppression of Ro Su Hui and members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon as an unpardonable insult to the desire of all fellow countrymen for national reconciliation, unity and reunification, fascist violence aimed to stamp out the pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea and moves to revive the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					Some days ago, the ruling "Saenuri Party's" gentry brought even the issue of instituting an evil law such as the "law on dissolving criminal organizations" at the "National Assembly", openly revealing its sinister intention to stamp out the pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					The reality goes to clearly prove that the desire of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification can never come true unless the history of treachery characterized by submission to foreign forces, fascist suppression and confrontation with fellow countrymen is brought to an end and a new society is built in south Korea.
					
					The puppet conservative ruling authorities are now working hard to bring under control the serious ruling crisis caused by the anti-"government" sentiment running high among people of various circles in south Korea by escalating the confrontation with the  DPRK and reviving the fascist tyrannical rule. But this will only precipitate their disgraceful ruin.
					
					The puppet group should immediately roll back the confrontation policy which brought the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and set free Ro and other pro-reunification patriots at once.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Discrimination against Korean Schools under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Discrimination against Korean Schools under Fire
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan on May 12 to demand the application of the tuition-free program for senior high schools and payment of subsidies to Korean schools.
					Present there were officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Koreans, students of Korean schools and Japanese citizens.
					
					An appeal was read out at the meeting.
					
					Intolerable are such national discrimination steps as the exclusion of Korean schools in the prefecture from the application of the program and suspension of payment of subsidies due to the unreasonable steps of the Japanese authorities, the appeal said, demanding the lifting of discrimination against Korean schools and equal opportunity of learning.
					
					It called on the Hiroshima Prefecture to make a breakthrough in abolishing national discrimination before any other prefectures.
					
					A demonstration was staged outside the Yamaguchi Prefectural Office on May 15 against the backdrop of ceaseless protests conducted by those concerned of the Yamaguchi Korean primary and middle school, Koreans and Japanese citizens against the office's suspension of the payment of subsidies to Korean schools.
					
					Ikuko Fujii, co-representative of the "Yamaguchi-Citizens Society for Keeping Alive the Constitution", denounced the unreasonable discriminating measure taken by the Prefectural office to exclude Korean students only from the payment of subsidies.
					
					Akie Koga, representative of the "Society for Japan-DPRK Friendship and Solidarity", said that it is intolerable that Japan applies the idea of discriminating against Koreans to education, vowing to stage a solidarity action to settle the issue of aiding Korean schools.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Accuse Osaka Mayor of His Remarks Justifying Japan's Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Accuse Osaka Mayor of His Remarks Justifying Japan's Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Members of Korean organizations in New York and New Jersey State in the United States staged a demonstration outside the Japanese mission to the UN in protest against the reckless remarks justifying the sexual slavery system for Imperial Japanese Army, according to KBS of south Korea on Saturday.
					Its participants said Osaka Mayor Hashimoto's remarks amount to negating history and killing the victims again.
					
					They called for proper education in forcible sexual slavery and flesh trafficking committed by Japan during the Second World War.

articles.title: WPK's New Line Supported by German Organization
articles.content:
WPK's New Line Supported by German Organization
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- A travel agency of Germany posted a news report of the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK)  on its website on May 22.
					The website noted the WPK at the plenary meeting advanced a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing revolution.
					
					This line is the most revolutionary and popular one which helps not only increase the defence capability of the country by developing nuclear force for self-defence but dynamically step up the building of a thriving socialist nation by directing greater efforts into economic construction, the website said, and went on:
					
					The line is a brilliant succession and development in depth onto a new high stage of the original line of pushing forward the economy in parallel with national defence advanced by President Kim Il Sung and thoroughly applied by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					The nuclear weapons of Songun Korea are not goods for getting U.S. dollars and they are neither a political bargaining chip nor a thing for economic dealings to be presented to the place of dialogue or be put on the table of negotiations aimed at forcing the DPRK to disarm itself.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige campo de esqui del desfiladero Masik
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige campo de esqui del desfiladero Masik
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el campo de esqui que se construye nuevamente por el EPC en el desfiladero Masik.
					El recibio en el mirador el parte detallado sobre el estado de construccion.
					
					Se mostro muy complacido de que los constructores militares hayan construido en las cordilleras las pistas primaria, intermediaria y avanzada que ocupan una superficie de centenares de miles de metros cuadrados y tienen casi 110 mil metros de largo y 40-120m de ancho.
					
					Dijo que el campo de esqui se halla en lugar adecuado porque aqui se puede practicar largo tiempo ese deporte y tiene buenas condiciones de trafico como autopista turistica Pyongyang-Wonsan.
					
					Tras averiguar como marcha la construccion de establecimientos importantes, tales como la jamba del campo, hotel, deposito de equipos de esqui, pista de aterrizaje de helicopteros y la instalacion de telefericos, el Mariscal subio a la cima del campo con una altura de mas de mil 360m sobre el nivel del mar.
					
					Contemplando el campo, senalo que es bueno el paisaje actual, pero sera mas espectacular cuando este cubierto de nieve.
					
					Enseno las tareas y remedios para acelerar la obra destacando que el partido tiene la firme decision de acondicionar el campo como el de talla mundial. 
					
					Prosiguio que los constructores militares deben acelerar la construccion para que el campo inicie su operacion desde el invierno de este ano. 
					
					Anadio que hay que formar buen sistema de desague para que las pistas no se laven por las precipitaciones en la estacion de lluvias y plantar los cespedes, que crezcan bien en la zona del desfiladero Masik, para mantener en buen estado las pistas aun despues de deshielo.
					
					Como parte de las medidas para prevenir accidentes, hace falta construir bien los lugares de descanso y la sala de primeros auxilios en los puntos de arranque, escala y meta de la pista y vigilar en tiempo real con el sistema de observacion automatica que se establezca a lo largo de la linea del funicular, instruyo.
					
					Encomendo que conserven la biosfera y no la contaminen durante la obra.
					
					Hay que impulsar la construccion, fijar la unidad administradora que pueda cuidar y operar bien este campo y tomar medidas para producir los equipos de deportes invernales, resalto.
					
					Puntualizo que los sectores relacionados deben suministrar con responsabilidad los equipos y materiales necesarios a la obra prestandole profunda atencion.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Son Chol Ju, Jon Chang Bok, Pak Jong Chon y So Hong Chan.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo de Minas de Musan
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre Complejo de Minas de Musan
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno la labor del Complejo de Minas de Musan, base de produccion de minerales de hierro.
					Recorriendo el taller de concentracion no.2, la mina filial al aire libre, la empresa de transportador de arranque de esteril, la de  transporte de minerales y otros lugares, se entero en detalles del estado de la produccion y la reconstruccion tecnica.
					
					En el terreno tuvo lugar la reunion de consulta de los funcionarios de la rama interesada.
					
					En la ocasion fueron debatidas las medidas para aumentar la produccion de los minerales de hierro utilizando bien la base de produccion ya preparada en el principio de dar preferencia a la evacuacion de esteril.
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para aumentar la tasa de funcionamiento de los medios de transporte que desempenan gran rol en la evacuacion de esteril y producir y suministrar a tiempo en las unidades relacionadas las piezas necesarias.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier destaco la necesidad de elevar la competitividad de los productos recorriendo la Fabrica de Alimentos de Musan y la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Madera de Musan.

articles.title: Direccion nortena de APRP denuncia la pena impuesta a Ro Su Hui
articles.content:
Direccion nortena de APRP denuncia la pena impuesta a Ro Su Hui
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 24, el Tribunal Supremo de Seul condeno a 4 anos de prision, en virtud de la infame "Ley de Seguridad", a Ro Su Hui, vicepresidente de la Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), quien habia visitado a Pyongyang para expresar condolencias por el gran duelo nacional.
					Ademas, impuso penas hasta al secretario general de la misma organizacion, quien padece ahora una grave enfermedad, por el absurdo cargo de haber ayudado la visita a Pyongyang de Ro.
					
					En una nota divulgada este lunes, el portavoz de la Direccion Nortena de la APRP condeno las penas dictadas en el juicio publico sobre esas personalidades surcoreanas, afirmando que tal conducta parte del intento fascista de reprimir y desintegrar la Direccion Surena estigmatizandola de "entidad proenemiga" y es climax de la febril campana conflictiva con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					La visita a Pyongyang de Ro Su Hui resulto una accion justa y loable que partio del deseo de promover la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					Esa visita no puede ser crimen en ningun caso tanto en vista de la elemental etica y moral como a la luz de costumbres nacionales heredadas de los antepasados.
					
					La reciente represion de los titeres surcoreanos contra los miembros de la Direccion Surena de la APRP constituye un insulto intolerable a la aspiracion de todos los compatriotas a la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y a la reunificacion de la patria, un acto fascista encaminado a exterminar a las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion en el Sur de Corea y una campana para resucitar la dictadura de "renovacion".
					
					Hace poco, los compinches del gobernante "Partido Saenuri" plantearon la institucion de la "ley sobre la disolucion de las entidades criminales" en la "Asamblea Nacional" exponiendo abiertamente su intento de acabar con todas las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion del Sur de Corea.
					
					La realidad evidencia que si no ponen punto final a la historia de traicion, matizada de sumision a las fuerzas extranjeras, represion fascista y enfrentamiento fratricida, y no cambian el mundo, los habitantes surcoreanos no podran realizar nunca su gran deseo de lograr la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					Ahora las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas tratan de buscar la salida de su crisis de gobernacion, causada por la escalada de clima antigubernamental en distintos sectores, en la campana de enfrentamiento con la RPDC y la reproduccion de la tirania. Pero, ese intento no dara otro resultado que adelantar su vergonzosa autodestruccion.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana debe cancelar sin demora su politica conflictiva, que llevo a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas, y excarcelar ahora mismo a las figuras patrioticas pro-reunificacion, inclusive el vicepresidente Ro Su Hui.

articles.title: ACNC critica el resurgimiento de dictadura de "renovacion" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC critica el resurgimiento de dictadura de "renovacion" en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- En el Sur de Corea se resucita el fantasma de la dictadura de "renovacion". 
					Los compinches del "Partido Saenuri", que resucitaron la dictadura de "renovacion" con los complots e intervencion politicos en las "elecciones presidenciales" del ano pasado, recurren ahora a la fabricacion de otra ley que promueva la dominacion dictatorial. 
					
					Reprimen y se desesperan por exterminar las fuerzas progresistas pro-reunificacion que aspiran a la independencia y la democracia de la sociedad surcoreana y se rebelan contra la dictadura, tildandolas de "fuerzas pro-Norte". 
					
					La "ley sobre la disolucion de las entidades criminales", que pretenden instituir los titeres surcoreanos, es peor que la tristemente celebre "ley de seguridad". 
					
					Esto evidencia que las actuales autoridades surcoreanas resucitaron la era de dominacion fascista de "renovacion" sobrepasando la dictadura "pragmatica" del traidor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					Como esta conocido por todo el mundo, la camarilla militar de Park Chung Hee, que usurpo el poder con bayonetas, practico la politica de pavor y convirtio toda la extension surcoreana en el infierno para la democracia y derechos humanos. 
					
					En virtud de la "ley marcial emergente", el "estado emergente", las "medidas urgentes", etc., fueron ejecutados incontables civiles inocentes en la corte marcial.
					
					Durante 18 anos de mandato de Park Chung Hee, fueron arrestados y asesinados cada ano 700 a 800 mil personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion y habitantes, o sea,  mas de 14 millones en total.
					
					La poblacion surcoreana, que sufrio heridas profundas bajo la dictadura de "renovacion", tiene pesadilla de aquel periodo. 
					
					La descendiente del dictador de "renovacion", que esta ahora en el poder, aplica mas cruelmente los metodos de dominacion fascista de su padre. 
					
					Antes de tomar el poder, ella defendio la dictadura de "renovacion", diciendo que si no fuera por ella, el Sur de Corea habria sido ocupado por el Norte de Corea, y en este sentido, no fue importa nada el atropello de la democracia en aquel tiempo. 
					
					Tal disparate demuestra la posicion y la concepcion de dominacion de la actual gobernante surcoreana. 
					
					En particular, en estos momentos en que las "medidas urgentes" tomadas durante la dictadura de Park Chung Hee se definen como inconstitucionales y se revelan sucesivamente los casos intrigantes de aquel periodo, las autoridades actuales se entregan a la fabricacion de nueva ley infame, lo cual es un desafio brutal a la libertad, los derechos humanos y la democracia. 
					
					Para no hacerse victimas de la dictadura de "renovacion", los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea deben levantarse en la lucha contra la dictadura y el "gobierno".

articles.title: Serán fracasados alborotos intrigantes de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Serán fracasados alborotos intrigantes de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos libró una campaña de recoger fondos so pretexto de apoyar las organizaciones y entidades que toman delantera de la artimaña de "DDHH" contra la República Popular Democrática de Corea, mientras expuso su intención de derrocar el digno régimen de ésta. Coincidiendo con esto, en el Sur de Corea se efectuó una reunión internacional, ocasión en la cual se desarrolló otra farsa de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					Tales alborotos son las locuras provocativas para desviar la opinión pública y realizar la ambición de agresión al Norte de Corea.
					
					Así revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un artículo individual de este lunes y prosigue:
					
					Los "DDHH" y la "democracia" de que suele hablar EE.UU. son la consigna agresiva tendente a aplastar a las naciones antiyanquis e independientes.
					
					Destruir la unidad monolítica entre el ejército y el pueblo y realizar la ambición de la "unificación mediante fusión de régimen", he aquí el objetivo de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Pero, tal objetivo es nunca realizable.
					
					El alboroto intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC no surtirá efecto para nosotros.
					
					Lo que obtendrán EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea a través de sus alborotos intrigantes es la vergüenza y la burla y la denuncia internacionales.
					
					La RPDC no perdonará a los conspiradores que ofenden atrevidamente el digno régimen de la RPDC y abrigan la ilusión de agredir a la RPDC.
